content:
VisualTreeChangeType Enum

Definition

Defines constants that specify whether the element was added or removed.

In this Article

public enum VisualTreeChangeType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
VisualTreeChangeType

Remarks

This type supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Fields

Add

The child element was added to the visual tree of the parent element.
Remove

The child element was removed from the visual tree of the parent element.
